name: FF Patra + Nested Patra
author: Alucard648
info: 2 orbiter Patra-like enemies made on request by SkyFlare.
description: //Orbiter/PatraHas up to 2 rings of enemies circling around. Invincible until all other orbiting enemies are killed. Then becomes more aggressive and faster. Can shoot eweapons.//Nested PatraLike FF Patra, but each time center core is hit for damage, he spawns new rings of orbiters and becomes invincible again.
setup: All default enemy movement params are used.Attribute 1: Tile Width & Tile HeightAttribute 2: Orbit rotation speed, reverse for inner orbit.Attribute 3: Delay between shooting, in framesAttribute 4: Number of enemies in outer orbit.Attribute 5: Number of enemies in inner orbit.Attribute 6: ID of enemies in outer orbit.Attribute 7: ID of enemies in inner orbit.Attribute 8: Outer/minimum radius. Half for inner radius.Attribute 9: If orbit radius can expand/shrink, this defines max radius.Attribute 10: And this defines radius fluctuating speed. 0 for disabling grow/shrink.Both Patra variants use the same attributes.
